conbody.p: For a REST method type that is not supported:
conbody.codeblock:
$ curl -v http://localhost:8093/query/service -X PUT \ -d "statement=SELECT text FROM tweets LIMIT 1" < HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed { "requestID": "6e0143ed-4657-4c9d-a184-703c930c7401",
"errors": [ { "code": <int>, "msg": "PUT is not supported" }], "status": "fatal", "metrics": { "elapsedTime": "134.7944us", "executionTime": "130.5518us", "resultCount": 0, "resultSize": 0, "mutationCount": 0, "errorCount": 1, "warningCount": 0 } } $
